Articles.Content:
This is the first thing I made with my Wacom Tablet!

I hope you like it

I like it, very nice

There's a really eerie dynamism about it, Eve, always so still and silent like all the planets, seen as if it were real.

Not bad, not bad.

If I may offer my critique, the line between the mountains and the sand dunes is a little abrupt. Blending them might make things a little extra convincing. Also, are those rocks flying in the wind? I'm not sure.
Very nice, hopefully this will inspire someone to make a volcano mod for Eve, would make a great place to take a surface sample!

Not bad, not bad.

If I may offer my critique, the line between the mountains and the sand dunes is a little abrupt. Blending them might make things a little extra convincing. Also, are those rocks flying in the wind? I'm not sure.

Thanks for your critique! This is the first thing I made in Photoshop. I'm sure I will improve in the future

Impressive! Please make more!

If I may add my own critique, I think it could use a tad more "purple" in it(perhaps if some of the rocks in the foreground had a slightly more pronounced purple tint), given how ridiculously purple Eve is in-game.

Again, very nice. I sure couldn't do that!

Universe
Really cool! However. The transfer between the sand and the volcano is quite abrupt. I almost thought it was a sea. Looking forward to more of your work!
